It's squid ink, everyone dodge!”"},{"lineNumber":145582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しょーもな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"“How lame...”"},{"lineNumber":145583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、とーう、それそれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Ah, take this, there!”"},{"lineNumber":145584,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは軽く剣を振るって、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance lightly swung his sword,"},{"lineNumber":145585,"originalJapaneseLine":"イカマン達を瞬殺した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and instantly killed the Squidmen."},{"lineNumber":145586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおっ！　すごい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“O-oh! Amazing!”"},{"lineNumber":145587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、みんな見ろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hey, everyone look!"},{"lineNumber":145588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの人、イカマンをあっという間に","translatedEnglishLine":"That guy wiped out the Squidmen in no time,"},{"lineNumber":145589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　殺してみせたぞ！　一瞬でだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"he showed us by killing them! In one instant!”"},{"lineNumber":145590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかもイカマンは三匹もいたのに","translatedEnglishLine":"“And there were three Squidmen too,"},{"lineNumber":145591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんの苦もなく倒してみせた！","translatedEnglishLine":"but he defeated them effortlessly!"},{"lineNumber":145592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんて強さだ！　この人、つ、強すぎるーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What strength! This guy is too, too strong——!”"},{"lineNumber":145593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こいつら俺のこと馬鹿にしてないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“...Aren’t these guys making fun of me?”"},{"lineNumber":145594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これが普通の人ですからね？","translatedEnglishLine":"“Because this is what a normal person is like, you know?”"},{"lineNumber":145595,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスさんの周りがおかしいだけですからね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“It’s just that the people around Rance-san are strange, that’s all.”"},{"lineNumber":145596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hmm.”"},{"lineNumber":145597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、イカマンにも手こずる人達じゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"“Well, if they struggle even against Squidmen,"},{"lineNumber":145598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物兵なんて一匹来ただけで大惨事だろうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"then if just one monster soldier comes, it’d be a disaster.”"},{"lineNumber":145599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それがいつ大軍で来るか分からないんですから……","translatedEnglishLine":"“And you never know when a large army might come..."},{"lineNumber":145600,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見た目は平和そうでも皆内心は不安な筈ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if it looks peaceful, everyone must be uneasy inside.”"},{"lineNumber":145601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hmm.”"},{"lineNumber":145602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もー……そんな興味なさそうな顔してぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Geez... making such a disinterested face...”"},{"lineNumber":145603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっ、貴方は私達の救世主です！","translatedEnglishLine":"“Oh! You are our savior!"},{"lineNumber":145604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　村長として村を代表して礼を言います！」","translatedEnglishLine":"On behalf of the village as the chief, I thank you!”"},{"lineNumber":145605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「是非、何かお礼をさせて下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Please, let us offer you some kind of gratitude!”"},{"lineNumber":145606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お礼？　なんでもいいのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“A reward? Anything is fine?”"},{"lineNumber":145607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"“...Hmm.”"},{"lineNumber":145608,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":".........."},

{"lineNumber":145609,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":145610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、なんでこうなるのよぉぉぉぉーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“So, why does it turn out like thisssss—!”"},

{"lineNumber":145611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　お礼に女の子を要求したら、","translatedEnglishLine":"“Gahaha! When I asked for a girl as a reward,"},

{"lineNumber":145612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　差し出されたのが君なんだから仕方ない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"you were the one offered, so it can’t be helped!”"},

{"lineNumber":145613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、こうしてまたアナセルちゃんと出会うとはな！","translatedEnglishLine":"“But to think I’d meet Anaseru-chan again like this!"},

{"lineNumber":145614,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これはもう運命と思って諦めるのだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess I just have to accept it as fate!”"},

{"lineNumber":145615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやーっ！　あの村の奴ら全員殺してやるー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Nooo! I’ll kill everyone in that village!”"},

{"lineNumber":145616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははははははは！　とーーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Gahahahahahahahaha! Take thisssss!”"},

{"lineNumber":145617,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":".........."},

{"lineNumber":145618,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":145619,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはたっぷりアナセルの体を堪能した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance thoroughly enjoyed Anaseru’s body."},

{"lineNumber":145620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？　なんだあれは」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hmm? What’s that?”"},

{"lineNumber":145621,"originalJapaneseLine":"街道の真ん中でヘルマン警備隊の","translatedEnglishLine":"In the middle of the highway, some members of the Hellman Guard"},{"lineNumber":145622,"originalJapaneseLine":"数名がたむろしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were loitering."},

{"lineNumber":145623,"originalJapaneseLine":"「邪魔だ、どけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"“You’re in the way, move.”"},

{"lineNumber":145624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんぎゃあっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Fungyaah!”"},

{"lineNumber":145625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「蹴る奴があるか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Who kicks someone like that!”"},

{"lineNumber":145626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アニキ、こういうときは","translatedEnglishLine":"“Aniki, at times like this,"},

{"lineNumber":145627,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どいて下さいって言うだけでいいんだよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"it’s enough to just say ‘Please move’, you know?”"},

{"lineNumber":145628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、道を塞いでる方が悪い」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hmph, the one blocking the road is the bad guy.”"},

{"lineNumber":145629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あいたた……","translatedEnglishLine":"“Ah, oww..."},

{"lineNumber":145630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ、いや、その兄ちゃんの言う通りだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, no, he’s right, that guy, ..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃー！　イカスミだ、みんな避けろー！」
「しょーもな……」
「あ、とーう、それそれ」
ランスは軽く剣を振るって、
イカマン達を瞬殺した。
「お、おおっ！　すごい！」
「おい、みんな見ろ！
あの人、イカマンをあっという間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That guy wiped out the Squidmen in no time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺してみせたぞ！　一瞬でだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he showed us by killing them! In one instant!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかもイカマンは三匹もいたのに
なんの苦もなく倒してみせた！
なんて強さだ！　この人、つ、強すぎるーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What strength! This guy is too, too strong——!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こいつら俺のこと馬鹿にしてないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “...Aren’t these guys making fun of me?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが普通の人ですからね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Because this is what a normal person is like, you know?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんの周りがおかしいだけですからね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “It’s just that the people around Rance-san are strange, that’s all.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん」
「ま、イカマンにも手こずる人達じゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Well, if they struggle even against Squidmen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵なんて一匹来ただけで大惨事だろうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then if just one monster soldier comes, it’d be a disaster.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがいつ大軍で来るか分からないんですから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “And you never know when a large army might come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見た目は平和そうでも皆内心は不安な筈ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it looks peaceful, everyone must be uneasy inside.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーん」
「もー……そんな興味なさそうな顔してぇ……」
「おおっ、貴方は私達の救世主です！
村長として村を代表して礼を言います！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On behalf of the village as the chief, I thank you!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「是非、何かお礼をさせて下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Please, let us offer you some kind of gratitude!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お礼？　なんでもいいのか？」
「……ふーん」
「で、なんでこうなるのよぉぉぉぉーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “So, why does it turn out like thisssss—!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　お礼に女の子を要求したら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Gahaha! When I asked for a girl as a reward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 差し出されたのが君なんだから仕方ない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were the one offered, so it can’t be helped!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、こうしてまたアナセルちゃんと出会うとはな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “But to think I’d meet Anaseru-chan again like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはもう運命と思って諦めるのだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess I just have to accept it as fate!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやーっ！　あの村の奴ら全員殺してやるー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Nooo! I’ll kill everyone in that village!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははははははは！　とーーーーーっ！」
ランスはたっぷりアナセルの体を堪能した。
「んー？　なんだあれは」
街道の真ん中でヘルマン警備隊の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the middle of the highway, some members of the Hellman Guard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数名がたむろしていた。
「邪魔だ、どけ」
「ふんぎゃあっ！」
「蹴る奴があるか！」
「アニキ、こういうときは
どいて下さいって言うだけでいいんだよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s enough to just say ‘Please move’, you know?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、道を塞いでる方が悪い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Hmph, the one blocking the road is the bad guy.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あいたた……
ああ、いや、その兄ちゃんの言う通りだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no, he’s right, that guy, ...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃー！　イカスミだ、みんな避けろー！」
「しょーもな……」
「あ、とーう、それそれ」
ランスは軽く剣を振るって、
イカマン達を瞬殺した。
「お、おおっ！　すごい！」
「おい、みんな見ろ！
あの人、イカマンをあっという間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That guy wiped out the Squidmen in no time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺してみせたぞ！　一瞬でだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he showed us by killing them! In one instant!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかもイカマンは三匹もいたのに
なんの苦もなく倒してみせた！
なんて強さだ！　この人、つ、強すぎるーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What strength! This guy is too, too strong——!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こいつら俺のこと馬鹿にしてないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “...Aren’t these guys making fun of me?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが普通の人ですからね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Because this is what a normal person is like, you know?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんの周りがおかしいだけですからね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “It’s just that the people around Rance-san are strange, that’s all.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん」
「ま、イカマンにも手こずる人達じゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Well, if they struggle even against Squidmen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵なんて一匹来ただけで大惨事だろうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then if just one monster soldier comes, it’d be a disaster.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがいつ大軍で来るか分からないんですから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “And you never know when a large army might come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見た目は平和そうでも皆内心は不安な筈ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it looks peaceful, everyone must be uneasy inside.”

「もー……そんな興味なさそうな顔してぇ……」
「おおっ、貴方は私達の救世主です！
村長として村を代表して礼を言います！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On behalf of the village as the chief, I thank you!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「是非、何かお礼をさせて下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Please, let us offer you some kind of gratitude!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　お礼に女の子を要求したら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Gahaha! When I asked for a girl as a reward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 差し出されたのが君なんだから仕方ない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were the one offered, so it can’t be helped!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、こうしてまたアナセルちゃんと出会うとはな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “But to think I’d meet Anaseru-chan again like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはもう運命と思って諦めるのだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess I just have to accept it as fate!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやーっ！　あの村の奴ら全員殺してやるー！」
